english: Wow, there's a lot of people at the Riverside today. Are there going to be any free spaces?
thai: ôo-hǒo...wan-níi rii-wooe-sai khon yóe ná. jà mii thîi-wâang mǎi nîa.

english: Should have. Just a minute. Let's try asking the waitress.
thai: nâa jà mii ná. dǐiao laawng thǎam phá-nák-ngaan-sòoep duu.

english: Waitress! Is there room for two people?
thai: náawng náawng. mii thîi-wâang sǎm-ràp sǎawng khon mǎi khráp.

english: There is. This way, please. What would you like to drink?
thai: mii khâ. chooen thaang níi looei khâ. ráp khrûueang-dùuem à-rai dii khá.

english: What beers do you all have?
We have Singha, Chang, and also Heineken.
thai: mii biia sǐng biia cháang láaeo gâaw biia hai-nee-gên khâ.

english: Well then, we'll have one large bottle of Chang beer and two empty glasses.
thai: ngán ao biia cháang khùuat yài nùeng khùuat gâaeo blàao sǎawng gâaeo khráp.

english: this place has a lot of tourists, aren't there, Rajeesh?
thai: ráan níi mii nák-thâwng-thîiao yóe nóe raa-jìit.

english: Yep. It must be because this place has bands that play Western music.
thai: châi khráp. nâa jà bpen phráw ráan níi mii wong-don-dtrii thîi lên phleeng fà-ràng.

english: Here's your beer.
That was a very funny show
thai: nân bpen gaan-sà-daaeng thîi dtà-lòk mâak

english: Are there going to be any more performances?
thai: láaeo jà mii gaan-sà-daaeng ìik mǎi

english: This place has a lot of tourists
There are four bottles of beer in the refrigerator
thai: mii biia sìi khùuat nai dtùu-yen

english: free space
band (musicians)
traveler
plain, empty, bare
to answer
refrigerator
tourists
performance
must/might be
waiter/waitress
polite way to say come
lesson audio
